```{r setupModelFitsToSurveySizeComps, include=FALSE}
    ##input model list
    Models<-params$Models;
    doc_type<-params$doc_type;
    plot1stObs<-params$plot1stObs;
    
    ##set appendix letter
    app="A";
    ##set knitr options for subsequent chunks
    knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo=FALSE, error=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, concordance=TRUE, fig.width=6.5, fig.height=3.5, dpi=300)
    
    ##set caption numbering
    if (!exists("fig")){
      fig<-1;#figures
      tbl<-0;#tables
    }
    
    cases<-names(Models);
    nCases<-length(cases);
```

#Model fits to size compositions, by year

##Survey size compositions
```{r plotFits.SurveyZCsLinePlots,results='asis',fig.height=6.5,fig.width=6.5,out.width="6.5in",fig.cap=captions,eval.after="fig.cap",fig.pos="H"}
  plts<-rCompTCMs::compareFits.SizeComps(Models,fleet.type="survey",catch.type="index",plot1stObs=plot1stObs,dodge=0,showPlot=FALSE,verbose=FALSE);
  captions<-wtsUtilities::getCaptionsFromGGPlotList(plts);
  for (plt in plts) {print(plt); cat("\n\n"); fig<-fig+1;}
  rm(plt,plts);
```

\FloatBarrier

\clearpage
